sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Plus, Search, Filter, LayoutGrid, List, Clock, MessageSquare, Paperclip, User, Calendar, X } from "lucide-react"; import "./App.css"; export default function App() { const [tasks, setTasks] = useState([ { id: 1, title: "Create Blog Content", description: "Write a blog about your design process and get it ready for publishing", person: "Elise", photo: "https://i.pravatar.cc/150?img=1", status: "backlog", priority: "Low", comments: 3, attachments: 0, date: "10/3" }, { id: 2, title: "Send Email to John", description: "Make sure to let John know about the issues changed that were made and get his approval", person: "Joe", photo: "https://i.pravatar.cc/150?img=2", status: "backlog", priority: "High", comments: 2, attachments: 0, date: "9/27" }, { id: 3, title: "Review UX Change", description: "Look through the document with the details of the changes that Scott made", person: "Noah", photo: "https://i.pravatar.cc/150?img=3", status: "backlog", priority: "High", comments: 1, attachments: 0, date: "9/23" }, { id: 4, title: "Send Out Proposals", description: "Feel free to expand and them a detailed proposal", person: "Ethan", photo: "https://i.pravatar.cc/150?img=4", status: "todo", priority: "Medium", comments: 2, attachments: 0, date: "9/29" }, { id: 5, title: "Design the Dashboard", description: "Be sure to look at client's specs and implement them into the design", person: "King", photo: "https://i.pravatar.cc/150?img=5", status: "todo", priority: "Low", comments: 2, attachments: 0, date: "10/10" }, { id: 6, title: "Design the Onboarding", description: "Make sure to keep the onboarding flow under 4 main steps", person: "Emma", photo: "https://i.pravatar.cc/150?img=6", status: "inprogress", priority: "High", comments: 2, attachments: 0, date: "10/5" }, { id: 7, title: "Send Files to Developer", description: "Upload file to Invision before sending over to the dev team", person: "Elise", photo: "https://i.pravatar.cc/150?img=1", status: "review", priority: "Medium", comments: 1, attachments: 0, date: "9/27" }, { id: 8, title: "Complete Documentation", description: "Ask the marketing team to help document the entire process", person: "King", photo: "https://i.pravatar.cc/150?img=5", status: "done", priority: "Low", comments: 3, attachments: 1, date: "9/20" } ]); const [filterStatus, setFilterStatus] = useState("all"); const [filterName, setFilterName] = useState(""); const [filterPriority, setFilterPriority] = useState("all"); const [showAddModal, setShowAddModal] = useState(false); const [viewMode, setViewMode] = useState("grid"); const [showFilters, setShowFilters] = useState(false); const [newTask, setNewTask] = useState({ title: "", description: "", person: "", priority: "Medium", status: "backlog" }); const handleAddTask = () => { if (!newTask.title || !newTask.person) { alert("Please enter both title and person"); return; } const task = { id: Date.now(), ...newTask, photo: `https://i.pravatar.cc/150?img=${Math.floor(Math.random() * 70)}`, comments: 0, attachments: 0, date: new Date().toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: 'numeric', day: 'numeric' }) }; setTasks(prev => [...prev, task]); setShowAddModal(false); setNewTask({ title: "", description: "", person: "", priority: "Medium", status: "backlog" }); }; const handleDragStart = (e, taskId) => { e.dataTransfer.setData("taskId", taskId); }; const handleDrop = (e, newStatus) => { e.preventDefault(); const taskId = parseInt(e.dataTransfer.getData("taskId")); if (!taskId) return; setTasks(prev => prev.map(t => t.id === taskId ? { ...t, status: newStatus } : t )); }; const filterTasks = (list) => { return list.filter(task => (filterStatus === "all" || task.status === filterStatus) && (filterPriority === "all" || task.priority.toLowerCase() === filterPriority.toLowerCase()) && (filterName.trim() === "" || task.person.toLowerCase().includes(filterName.toLowerCase())) ); }; const columns = [ { id: "backlog", label: "BACKLOG", color: "green" }, { id: "todo", label: "TO DO", color: "orange" }, { id: "inprogress", label: "IN PROGRESS", color: "red" }, { id: "review", label: "REVIEW", color: "purple" }, { id: "done", label: "DONE", color: "blue" } ]; return (
{/* Sidebar */}
{/* Filter Sidebar */}

Filter Tasks

setFilterName(e.target.value)} />
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Header */}
View:
{/* Kanban Board */}
{columns.map(col => (
e.preventDefault()} onDrop={(e) => handleDrop(e, col.id)} >

{col.label}

{filterTasks(tasks) .filter(task => task.status === col.id) .map(task => (
handleDragStart(e, task.id)} >

{task.title}

{task.priority}

{task.description}

{task.comments} {task.attachments > 0 && ( {task.attachments} )} {task.date}
{task.person}
))}
))}
{/* Add Task Button */}
{/* Add Task Modal */} {showAddModal && (
setShowAddModal(false)}>
e.stopPropagation()}>

Add New Task

setNewTask({...newTask, title: e.target.value})} />
